sub_title: Advisor Oceans and Coasts Programme at WWF Netherlands (WNF / Wereld Natuur Fonds)
summary:
Marine biologist and internationally oriented researcher and conservationist interested in supporting both global and local conservation programs. Used to working in culturally diverse and basic conditions, making the most of limited resources. At my best whilst working in a team of like-minded individuals.

Specialties: Intercontinental teamwork
Global training and coaching of colleagues
Translating regulatory requirements into globally accepted processes
Presiding over multidisciplinary workgroups in global projects
Adhering to and enforcing strict deadlines
Multitasking and prioritizing
Budget management
Out-of-the box solutions
Detecting and addressing problems early 
Communication skills to match the above
PADI Rescue certified, 300+ logged dives
